entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pickle Lake

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
